resources.string: “If something stands between you and your success, move it. Never be denied.”
RunRepsTracker is an application for running and exercising and provides a simple and easy way to track your results.
The PushUp button opens a new screen that provides the ability to count the pushups, set the number of repetitions and save the results to the database.
The SitUp button opens a new screen that provides the ability to count the situps, set the number of repetitions and save the results to the database.
The Run button opens a new screen that shows the current location, draws a path and allows you to measure the time and distance.
The ResultHistory button opens a new screen that provides the option to select the history of pushup, situp, and running results.

“Results happen
 over time,
 not overnight.
 Work hard, stay consistent
 and
 be patient.”
